description:
Conversion to form a 2 bedroom flat on each of the first and second floors and a 1 bedroom flat in a new mansard third floor. 
Applicants Plan Nos:20281/120A,130A,131A(LBI Reg. No:21602), 20281/001,020,030,031(LBI Reg.No:21601)
decision_conditions:
CONDITION:   The chimney pots on the existing chimney stack in the party wall with 176 Tollington Park shall  be retained and the stack be extended as part of the construction of the new mansard storey  up to a similar height to that in the party wall with 85 Stroud Green Road, with the retaining chimney pots being reinstalled to the satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority prior to the first occupation of the one bedroom flat in the new mansard storey and shall be so retained thereafter.

REASON:  To ensure that the Local Planning Authority may be satisfied with the external appearance of the building.
